Description.Text:
Property Location
Hotel Adler Madrid is in the heart of Madrid, walking distance from National Archaeological Museum of Spain and La Caixa Foundation. This 5-star hotel is close to Prado Museum and Plaza Mayor.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 44 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LED televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and separate sitting areas.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include express check-out, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Planning an event in Madrid? This hotel has facilities measuring 215 square feet (20 square meters), including a meeting room.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is Noon
